Html:
I tried to create a second MasterPage for signup where there is no sidebar or what nut, but it kept giving an error. Anybody has done something like this before?

Any help would be great.

 

Thanks in advance!

While creating master page, do not create with codebehind page (i.e yourmasterpage.cs shouldn't be there)

Hope this helps.
I am already not doing that. So...

Hi zeroinfinity,

What is the error you are getting? Post it here.

Cheers

Le courant serpente entre les prairies parfumées, Les arbres fleuris deviennent ugg bootsneigeux sous les rayons argentés; Dans l'air qui semble condensé, se meut le givre Qui voile les rives sablonneuses, à peine distinctes.
